title: Survival and adaptative strategies of Enterotoxigenic
authors: Sjöling Å, Ashokkumar E, Bjurnemark C, Thorell K, Xiao X, von Mentzer A, Hu YOO, Zhu B, Joffré E
abstract: Waterborne pathogenic enterobacteria are adapted for infection of human hosts but can also survive for long periods in water environments. To understand how the human pathogen enterotoxigenic
